Volume.description: Volume adjustment of the sound event in decibels.

Pitch.description: Pitch adjustment of the sound event in semitones.

MusicDuckingVolume.description: Amount to duck music volume when playing in decibels.

AmbientDuckingVolume.description: Amount to duck ambient sounds when playing in decibels.

StartAttenuationDistance.description: Distance at which to begin attenuation in blocks.

MaxDistance.description: Maximum distance at which this sound event can be heard in blocks (i.e. the distance at which it's attenuated to zero).

MaxInstance.description: Max concurrent number of instances of this sound event.

PreventSoundInterruption.description: Whether to prevent interruption of this sound event.

Layers.description: The layered sounds that make up this sound event.

AudioCategory.description: Audio category to assign this sound event to for additional property routing.
